data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9DTQXUsIn6MQ7kNvgG0MOgq&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AfXx2mqgLvib7IchxmPkHuN&oh=00_AYDX_EwIMf_dwXL5JHz3I31IKXnYRg-rdkguCLhfACXtFA&oe=66E6C337)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=RclBYND49dYQ7kNvgEcJG5p&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AfXx2mqgLvib7IchxmPkHuN&oh=00_AYD_YLAETBtLELTJyGstdMXndhfElzyCucqN_z_OV9KTQw&oe=66E6D0D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=IxAQukRO6VcQ7kNvgH0bU0M&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AfXx2mqgLvib7IchxmPkHuN&oh=00_AYBrrXK5zuYDTBcqbTHUkAMytaiBIDPcd4LsyR0ODIqdjQ&oe=66E6BC09)
